experience.title: Senior Data Scientist - Marketing Team
experience.full_description: • Analyzed and transformed large data sets into actionable insights to support C-suite stakeholders in streamlining business operations and enhancing customer experience. • Developed statistical reports and visualizations using tools like SAS, Tableau, and proprietary systems to provide key insights for more than 20 marketing campaigns and initiatives, including A/B testing, customer retention, brand awareness, and global expansion. • Collaborated with senior leadership to develop and implement digital marketing strategies, identifying new tactics and implementing them to improve campaign performance by 50% and generate a 250% increase in revenue from search marketing campaigns. • Managed a team of data engineers and BI analysts to optimize the efficiency of customer recommendation analytics engine, resulting in a 33% improvement in processing speed.
